vega.uplink.pointing.PtrParameters

Class Height

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingElement
        • vega.uplink.pointing.PtrParameters.Height

  • public class Height
extends PointingElement
    The boresight is pointed towards the point that lies the specified height along the local normal of the selected point on the limb.
